Community Partners.name: Friends of Figma, Philippines
description: Figma's vision is to make design accessible to everyone. Friends of Figma exists so users of this collaborative design tool can come together to help each other; lifting everyone up. It’s run by the community and everyone is welcome. The Philippine chapter of Friends of Figma was started in 2018 and it's the first of its kind in Asia.

Community Partners.name: UXSEA Society
description: UXSEA Society is a trusted non-profit UX community that unifies, connects, and support all-level UX professionals, enthusiasts, and students across SEA through knowledge-sharing and collaboration with local communities.

SouthEast Asia is diverse, young, and vibrant. The Design problems and UX practice here can be different in many aspects when compared with geographies like North America, UK and the EU. Underlying reasons for this diversity is the significant variation in culture, language and larger income gaps.

By connecting fellow UXers residing in Southeast Asia, we hope to build connections and conversations that will help the understanding and growth of UX practice in the region.UXSEA Society is non-profit and an officially registered entity.

Community Partners.name: Design Buddies
description: Design Buddies is an inclusive community for designers from all backgrounds to connect, share resources, and participate in virtual events. We have mentorship programs, workshops, AMAs, portfolio reviews, and more. All for free.

Community Partners.name: UXDVO
description: A non-profit community for user experience design practitioners and digital designers from Davao City and neighboring Mindanao municipalities.

Community Partners.name: Developh
description: Developh is an international student-led nonprofit accelerating technology & experiences for social good.

Community Partners.name: PWA Pilipinas
description: The community organization for Progressive Web Apps (PWA) enthusiasts, designers and developers in the Philippines.

Community Partners.name: Ambidextr
description: Ambidextr is a full-service content marketing studio backed by Future Now Ventures. They are the communications arm of some of Asia Pacific’s leading tech companies, who they partner with to usher in the future through great content and creative. While Ambidextr works primarily with tech companies, they are open to collaborating with any individual, company, or organization that wants to prepare their brand for the new digital economy.

Community Partners.name: Roots
description: Roots is a podcast about the stories of Filipino designers. It’s a safe space to be vulnerable and share about who they are. Guests talks about their career journeys, quirks, hobbies, techniques, life aspirations, and what makes them tick.

Community Partners.name: CebUXD
description: CebUXD is the first user-centered design community in Cebu where UX practitioners and enthusiasts can freely share design ideas, experiences, and techniques that helps grow and cultivate UX in the region.

Community Partners.name: Streets to Schools
description: Streets to Schools (STS) is a youth organization founded by young leaders aged 12 to 15 back in 2017. STS aims to bring quality education to impoverished students, and to provide opportunities for all children, regardless of social status. Furthermore, it aims to intersect the advocacy of both the United Nations’ Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and United Nations Conventions on the Rights of the Child (UNCRC) in their initiatives. By following and acting on these goals, it believes that it can make the state of Education for Sustainable Development in the Philippines more inclusive and of better quality.

Community Partners.name: Philippine Tech Community Leads
description: PH Tech Community Leads is a community of tech leaders that aims to produce and empower tech community leaders through continuous advocacy, collaboration and education to improve IT skills and culture in the Philippines.

Community Partners.name: QBO Innovation Hub
description: QBO (‘ku-bo’) is the country’s first public-private initiative for startups and it’s our mission to create a globally competitive startup ecosystem in the Philippines.

General Sponsors.name: Toasty
description: Toasty is a video meeting platform that focuses on driving online collaborations in meetings and workshops. It comes with built-in activities, breakout rooms, integration with Miro and Google Doc, to empower collaborations and drive outcomes.

General Sponsors.name: Amazing Design People List
description: ADPList is an online community platform for designers to find and book mentorships and events.

General Sponsors.name: Icebreaker
description: Icebreaker is an online event platform that connects everyone at your company, university, or community — even while working remotely. Build community, culture, and connection today.

General Sponsors.name: PayMongo
description: PayMongo is a payment platform for the modern business that allows anyone to easily accept online payments from their customers online via credit cards, e-wallets and over-the-counter.

General Sponsors.name: UXR Collective
description: UXR Collective is the best place to learn about UX research. Sign up today for new research talks, case studies, and shows published every week for just $12/month.

General Sponsors.name: Design Center of the Philippines
description: The Design Center of the Philippines is the country’s leading agency committed to cultivating a culture that thrives on creativity, value creation, and innovation.

Design Center’s efforts go beyond promoting the value of good design and onto inspiring creative industries to create human-centered products, services, and spaces that make an impact in the Philippines and in the world. From enhancing human experiences to enabling inclusive and sustainable economic growth, we ensure that design plays its role as a creative, strategic, and innovative tool for positive development.

General Sponsors.name: Invisio
description: Coming Soon!

Premium Sponsors.name: Figma
description: Figma is a design platform for teams who build products together. Born on the Web, Figma helps the entire product team create, test, and ship better designs, faster.
